com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport

Class SetItemSecurityPermissions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.Command
      • com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.SetItemSecurityPermissions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand, ISecurityPermissionChangeSet

    public final class SetItemSecurityPermissions
extends Command
implements ICommand, ISecurityPermissionChangeSet
    The ICommand for changing the security permissions on an Item. Changes can be specified explicitly using SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions, or implicitly using SecurityTags.

    Leasing:

    • An active lease must exist on the Item whose security permissions are to be set.
    Authorization:
    • The current user must have the SecurityGrantLevel.UPDATE grant level for the Item having its security permissions set.
    Validation:
    • After the change, there must be at least one SecurityAccessPermission for each "access" SecurityDimension in the SecuritySchema.
    • After the change, there must be at least one SecurityGrantPermission for each "grant" SecurityDimension in the SecuritySchema.
    • When setting SecurityAccessPermissions or SecurityGrantPermissions explicitly, on an Item that is currently using SecurityTags, both SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions must be provided.
    • See SecurityAccessPermission and SecurityGrantPermission for more validation rules.
    Since:
    1.0

      Gets the ItemIdentifier of the Item whose security permissions are to be set.

      Gets a String indicating whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions.

      Gets Strings containing the identifiers of the new SecurityTags for the Item.
      void setAccessPermissions(Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> accessPermissions)
      Sets the SecurityAccessPermissions to be given to the identified Item.
      void setGrantPermissions(Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> grantPermissions)
      Sets the SecurityGrantPermissions to be given to the identified Item.
      void setSecurityPermissionsSignpost(String securityPermissionsSignpost)
      Sets the indicator of whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions to the specified String.
      void setSecurityTagIds(Collection<String> securityTagIds)
      Sets the SecurityTags to be given to the identified Item to those with the specified String identifiers.
